H0.text: Who wrote the title song for the James Bond film From Russia With Love. John Barry

H1.text: Who wrote the title song for the James Bond film From Russia With Love. Burt Bacharach

H2.text: Who wrote the title song for the James Bond film From Russia With Love. Anthony Newley

H3.text: Who wrote the title song for the James Bond film From Russia With Love. Lionel Bart

A4.text: The theme song was composed by Lionel Bart of Oliver! fame and sung by Matt Monro
